both mitts row 57-62 k19 p1 k12 p1 b row 63 k19 p1 6-st lc 6-st rc p1 e row 64-70 k19 p1 k12 p1 ll a row 71 k19 p1 6-st lc 6-st rc p1 s row 72 - 74 k19 p1 k12 p1 m row 75 k2 k2tog k11 ssk k2 p1 k12 p1 row 76 k17 p1 k12 p1 i # row 77 k1 k2tog k11 ssk k1 p1 k12 p1 e n s row 78 k15 p1 k12 p1 row 79 k2tog k5 k2tog k4 ssk p1 6-st lpc 6-st rpc move your final unknit stitch to the beginning of the next row row 80 k2tog k10 ssk p1 p2tog k6 p2tog move your final unknit stitch to the beginning of the next row row 81 k2tog k2 sssk k3tog k2 ssk p1 sssk k3tog move your final unknit stitch to the beginning of the next row row 82 k2tog x3 ssk x3 break your thread leaving a 6 tail and thread it through the remaining 6 live stitches cinch and tie off thumb gusset divide your 11 live stitches across three #8 dpns as follows 4 4 3 row 1 knit across all stitches pick up 4 stitches in the open gap and join in the round row 2 knit to last 4 stitches k2tog x2 row 3-12 knit row 13&14 k2tog repeat until only 4 stitches are left break your thread leaving a 6 tail and thread it through the remaining 4 live stitches cinch and tie off weave in all ends wet block and enjoy pattern and photography copyright © 2008 marielle henault all rights reserved www subliminalrabbit com
